snippet: Investors who have money to put back to work after being paid for earlier private investments are driving the surge in fund-raising.
abstract: Triago reports private equity funds collected $364 billion in first three quarters of 2015, and fund-raising is on pace to reach $468 billion by year-end.
lead_paragraph: Investors who have money to put back to work after being paid for earlier private investments are driving the surge in fund-raising.

headline.main: Private Equity Market Is Expected to Attract $629 Billion in 2015
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Private Equity Is on Track for Record Fund-Raising Year
